Public API documentation for filearchive.

Typedef Documentation

typedef void fa_archive_t

Archive handle

typedef void fa_dir_t

Directory handle

typedef void fa_file_t

File handle

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum fa_entrytype_t

What kind of entry that has been enumerated

Enumerator:
FA_ENTRY_FILE 

Entry is a file - name, compression, size and hash are valid

FA_ENTRY_DIR 

Entry is a directory - name is valid

enum fa_mode_t

Mode for archive access

Enumerator:
FA_MODE_READ 

Open archive for read access. No methods writing data to the archive are accessible in this mode

FA_MODE_WRITE 

Open archive for write access. No methods reading, seeking or enumerating entries in the archive are available in this mode

enum fa_seek_t

What origin to use when seeking inside an archive file

Enumerator:
FA_SEEK_SET 

Origin is set to the beginning of the file

FA_SEEK_CURR 

The current offset is used as the origin

FA_SEEK_END 

Origin is set to the end of the file
